title: Welcome!

title: Welcome!
learning_objectives...6: Learners can use the Element chat to introduce themselves.

title: Welcome!
learning_objectives...6: Learners can open an issue on GitHub and tag the course instructor.

title: Welcome!
learning_objectives...6: Learners can clone a repository from GitHub and use the GitHub PAT to push a commit from their local repository to GitHub.

title: Welcome!
learning_objectives...6: Learners can navigate the course website and understand the learning objectives of the course.

title: Data science lifecycle & Exploratory data analysis using visualization
learning_objectives...6: Learners can identify four components of a Quarto file (YAML, code chunk, R code, markdown).

title: Data science lifecycle & Exploratory data analysis using visualization
learning_objectives...6: Learners can list the six elements of the data science lifecycle.

title: Data science lifecycle & Exploratory data analysis using visualization
learning_objectives...6: Learners can describe the four main aesthetic mappings that can be used to visualise data using the ggplot2 R Package.

title: Data science lifecycle & Exploratory data analysis using visualization
learning_objectives...6: Learners can control the colour scaling applied to a plot using colour as an aesthetic mapping.

title: Data science lifecycle & Exploratory data analysis using visualization
learning_objectives...6: Learners can compare three different geoms (bar/col, histogram, point) and their use case.

title: Data transformation with dplyr
learning_objectives...6: Learners can apply ten functions from the dplyr R Package to generate a subset of data for use in a table or plot.

title: Data import & Data organization in spreadsheets (Google Forms and Google Sheets for survey analysis)
learning_objectives...6: Learners can import data from files in CSV and XLSX format located in sub-directories of the root directory.

title: Data import & Data organization in spreadsheets (Google Forms and Google Sheets for survey analysis)
learning_objectives...6: Learners can explain the difference between the vector class character and the vector class factor.

title: Data import & Data organization in spreadsheets (Google Forms and Google Sheets for survey analysis)
learning_objectives...6: Learners can discuss the difference between unprocessed raw data, processed analysis-ready data, and data underlying a publication.

title: Data import & Data organization in spreadsheets (Google Forms and Google Sheets for survey analysis)
learning_objectives...6: Learners can apply 12 principles for data organisation in spreadsheets to the layout of a provided dataset.

title: Conditions & Dates & Tables
learning_objectives...6: Learners can apply functions from dplyr to change specific values of a variable in a dataframe.

title: Conditions & Dates & Tables
learning_objectives...6: Learners can apply functions from the lubridate package to convert dates not in ISO 8601 to the date class in R.

title: Conditions & Dates & Tables
learning_objectives...6: Learners can apply functions from knitr and gt package to display and cross-reference tables in HTML output reports.

title: Conditions & Dates & Tables
learning_objectives...6: Learners can understand the relevance a data dictionary to describe variable names in a data set.

title: Data types & Vectors & Pivoting
learning_objectives...6: Learners can identify different ways of accessing a vector from a dataframe

title: Data types & Vectors & Pivoting
learning_objectives...6: Learners can list the four main atomic vector types in R.

title: Data types & Vectors & Pivoting
learning_objectives...6: Learners can apply functions from the tidyr R Package to transform their data from a wide to a long format and vice versa.
